simp_chinese: 只重置立绘，此操作基本没有副作用。可以用于改变立绘的游戏事件触发后手动重置立绘
english: Reset the portratits of leaders. No side effect. Mostly use to reset portraits after game event that change portraits during midgame.

simp_chinese: 重置领袖并修复名称，领袖可能会离开当前职位。
english: Reset leaders and fix their names. Notice that leaders could unassgin from current positions.
